TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed IntersectionDetail extends System.Enum

summary.span: Fornece informações sobre a interseção entre as geometrias no e o visual que recebeu um clique.

span.span: Provides information about the intersection between the geometries in the and the visual which was hit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A ilustração a seguir mostra a relação entre a geometria de teste de clique (o círculo azul) e a visual geometria (o quadrado vermelho).The following illustration shows the relationship between the hit test geometry (the blue circle) and the visual geometry (the red square). ![Diagrama de IntersectionDetail usado no teste de hit](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "diagrama de IntersectionDetail usado no teste de clique")![Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing") Interseção entre a geometria de teste de clique e geometry visual durante o teste de cliqueIntersection between hit test geometry and visual geometry during hit testing ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o propriedade .The following example shows how to use the property of . [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/GeometryHitTest.cs#hittestingoverviewsnippet11)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/geometryhittest.vb#hittestingoverviewsnippet11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.IntersectionDetail Empty = int32(1)

summary.span: O parâmetro de teste de clique e o visual de destino ou a geometria não se interseccionam.

span.span: The hit test parameter and the target visual, or geometry, do not intersect.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.IntersectionDetail FullyContains = int32(3)

summary.span: O parâmetro de teste de clique está totalmente contido no limite do visual ou da geometria de destino.

span.span: The hit test parameter is fully contained within the boundary of the target visual or geometry.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.IntersectionDetail FullyInside = int32(2)

summary.span: O visual de destino ou a geometria está totalmente dentro do parâmetro de teste de clique .

span.span: The target visual, or geometry, is fully inside the hit test parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.IntersectionDetail Intersects = int32(4)

summary.span: O parâmetro de teste de clique e o visual de destino ou a geometria, se interseccionam.

span.span: The hit test parameter and the target visual, or geometry, intersect.

summary.span: Isso significa que os dois elementos se sobrepõem, mas nenhum elemento contém o outro.

span.span: This means that the two elements overlap, but neither element contains the other.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.IntersectionDetail NotCalculated = int32(0)
